channel.title: CVE Feed for GrandSlambert -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for GrandSlambert -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-47813|2023-11-22T22:43:33.243Z -- grandslambert -- better%20rss%20widget
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in grandslambert Better RSS Widget plugin <= 2.8.1 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-34369|2023-07-25T13:02:01.458Z -- grandslambert -- login%20configurator
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in GrandSlambert Login Configurator plugin <= 2.1 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-34175|2023-08-30T13:39:25.858Z -- grandslambert -- login%20configurator
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in GrandSlambert Login Configurator plugin <= 2.1 versions.
